👩🏼‍🔬#HumanRightsDay | During these challenging times, since #biotechnology professionals have been at the frontlines and took the challenge of finding a #vaccine to save lives— we've asked Flor Pujol, Ph.D. in Biology to provide some insights about the road ahead.
